title: Dermatology Services | VMFH
cleaned_text: Virginia Mason's board-certified dermatologists evaluate and treat disorders of the skin, hair and nails for both adults and children. We also receive challenging referral cases from all over the Pacific Northwest, thanks to the reputation of our highly respected physicians and teaching medical center. Our dermatologists offer a "total skin care" approach, including: You shouldn't trust your cosmetic procedures to just anyone. At Virginia Mason's Dermatology Clinic, every consultation and procedure is performed by a board-certified dermatologist. In addition to these services, our licensed aestheticians offer a variety of treatments to enhance your appearance and skin health in our [Medi Spa](/content/vmfhorg/en/our-services/plastic-and-reconstructive-surgery/cosmetic-services/services-we-offer.html). Phototherapy is the treatment of certain skin disorders with ultraviolet light. Commonly treated skin disorders include psoriasis, atopic dermatitis and eczema. There are at least a dozen more skin disorders that Virginia Mason Franciscan Health treats with phototherapy. For more
